title: The Butterfly Effect: How Oct 7 made America the world's 'daddy'
description: That day, a terrorist organisation’s desire to imbibe a little culture by paragliding into a music festival ended up rewriting the world order. The story that followed could have been directed by Quentin Tarantino: gory, non-linear, with all threads interconnected and a few perverts thrown in. Israel’s furious response, with help from Uncle Sam, led to the dismantling of Iran’s Axis of Resistance, tangentially hastened Trump’s return to the White House, and reminded Russia, China, and even Europe who is Daddy.

description: Virat Kohli's return to the No. 1 ODI batting ranking was marred by an ICC error regarding his days at the top. Initially stated as 825 days, the figure was corrected to 1,547 days, placing him third all-time and first among Indians. This correction followed a backlash from fans and statisticians.

title: Mumbai BMC election results 2026: Uddhav Thackeray's Shiv Sena's 30-year control collapses
description: Early trends indicate the Mahayuti alliance, led by BJP and Eknath Shinde's Shiv Sena, is poised to end the Shiv Sena (UBT)'s 30-year dominance in the BMC. The alliance is leading in over 110 wards, with BJP showing significant strength. Similar trends are observed in Pune, where BJP is displacing the Pawars.

description: A Mumbai man's life was saved after a sudden stroke, thanks to his wife's quick thinking and a hospital team's swift intervention. Arriving within the critical 20-minute window, doctors successfully removed a blockage in his brain artery, restoring blood flow and reversing severe symptoms. This case highlights the vital importance of rapid medical attention for stroke victims.

US visa: Faster interview slots in some Indian cities; Mumbai, Delhi wait times inside
description: US visa interview wait times for Indian applicants show significant variation across cities and visa types. While Hyderabad and Kolkata offer faster appointments for visitor visas, Mumbai and New Delhi face longer delays. Student visa processing is generally quicker, with New Delhi providing the earliest slots. Employment visa availability also differs, with Mumbai showing the shortest wait.

title: Jalna civic polls: Gauri Lankesh murder accused Shrikant Pangarkar celebrates victory
description: In an unexpected political victory, Shrikant Pangarkar, a figure entwined in the Gauri Lankesh murder case, has declared independence triumphantly by winning a seat on the Jalna Municipal Corporation. Freshly released on bail, he previously attempted to align with the Shiv Sena, but that affiliation was cut short.

description: Inspired by his mother's vision, Khan Sir is launching affordable hospitals in Patna, offering services like blood tests for Rs 7 and ECGs for Rs 25. His initiative aims to make healthcare accessible, with treatments reportedly cheaper than government facilities. The hospital will feature a blood bank, cancer treatment, and advanced dialysis, prioritizing hygiene with unique anti-infection operation theatre mats.

‘This time bullet won’t miss target’: Iran airs clip of Trump's 2024 assassination attempt
description: Iranian state television aired footage showing a threat against US President Donald Trump, displaying a placard with his image and a message implying a failed assassination attempt. This direct threat follows Trump's warnings of military action against Iran amid ongoing anti-government protests and previous Iranian plots against him.

title: Raped as minor & killed at 18: Diary helps Delhi cops nab relative
description: Seven months after an 18-year-old girl's murder, police apprehended a relative for alleged sexual assault during her childhood. The diary entry revealed the abuse, which occurred when the accused was also a minor. Separately, the girl's classmate confessed to her murder, claiming she attacked him first. The victim's father alleged ongoing harassment.

title: Chiefs heiress Gracie Hunt's heartfelt life update amid team's tough season
description: The Kansas City Chiefs had a pretty disappointing season this time, but the billionaire heiress, Gracie Hunt, has always been there for the team. Amid all the mess, Gracie Hunt has made a wholesome post about her life along with a few inspirational words that has moved fans. With the team's poor performance, many of their players are also getting trolled brutally.

title: AI’s biggest bottleneck: Google executive sounds alarm on America’s no. 1 problem
description: A senior official at Google has highlighted the frailties of America's power grid as a significant barrier to AI advancement, pointing to alarming delays – some stretching over ten years – in connecting new data centers. To address this bottleneck, Google is considering establishing data centers in proximity to power plants.

title: Zuckerberg hired Wang for $14bn, now they're clashing
description: Meta's new structure reveals tension between Mark Zuckerberg and Alexandr Wang, the $14 billion AI recruit. Wang finds Zuckerberg's micromanagement stifling, while staff question his leadership for Meta's AI ambitions. A recent strategy clash highlighted differing priorities, with Wang pushing for cutting-edge AI over immediate product integration.
